p.k: The Perfect Team Onion worries his relationship with Apple is in jeopardy when a stray cat enters the picture.
p.d: Apple and Onion are two best friends who live in a big city full of other food-people. Together, they use their can-do attitudes and out of the box thinking to find new adventures around every corner, take on the challenges of life in the big city, and make some new friends along the way.
